titles.title: A bill for relief of Benjamin Cabrera-Gomez and Londy Patricia.
A bill for relief of Benjamin Cabrera-Gomez and Londy Patricia.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary: Declares that Benjamin Cabrera-Gomez and Londy Patricia Cabrera shall be eligible for issuance of an immigrant visa or for adjustment of status to that of an alien lawfully admitted for permanent residence upon filing the appropriate application.
